purpose: Master catalog of all AI prompts and custom instructions for taxonomy workflows

migration_info.reason: Architectural reorganization - moving to department-shared resources for better alignment with taxonomy structure

categories.purpose: Process videos to extract taxonomy-relevant content (Phases 1-4)
Complete taxonomy gap analysis and entity updates (Phases 5-7)
Specialized prompts for individual LIBRARIES maintenance
Prompts for external research, launch tracking, and intelligence gathering
Prompts for HR recruitment workflow automation and candidate management
Cross-functional workflow prompts for project management and documentation

prompts.name: Video Transcription Custom Instructions
prompts.purpose: System instructions for AI transcription with taxonomy focus
prompts.description: Core transcription methodology with structured extraction format. Identifies workflows, actions, tools, objects, task chains, and responsibilities vocabulary from video content.
prompts.use_when: Creating initial video transcription from audio/video content
prompts.output: Video_XXX.md with structured transcription and taxonomy extraction

cross_references.tools: Catalogs mentioned tools for Tools library
cross_references.responsibilities: Identifies activity phrases for Responsibilities library

prompts.name: Video Naming Business Alternatives
prompts.purpose: Convert casual/clickbait video titles to professional, taxonomy-friendly alternatives
prompts.description: Provides naming principles (descriptive, specific, professional), 5 naming formula templates, conversion process from casual to business, real examples, and quality validation checklist.
prompts.use_when: Documenting videos in library catalogs, creating professional file names
prompts.output: Professional title suitable for business documentation and taxonomy listings

cross_references.transcribations: Professional titles used in Video_XXX.md files
cross_references.products: Naming conventions align with Products library standards

prompts.name: Video Analysis Prompt
prompts.purpose: Step-by-step guide for analyzing transcriptions and extracting taxonomy elements
prompts.description: Tool extraction methodology, workflow extraction with structured format, action verb categorization (5 categories), task chain identification, responsibilities vocabulary extraction, integration pattern documentation, with real examples from Video_001.
key_sections: Action verb categorization (Creation, Modification, Analysis, Organization, Communication)
Real examples from Video_001 (GLIF, workflows, thumbnails)
prompts.use_when: Performing initial pass on video transcription to identify all taxonomy elements
prompts.output: Structured inventory of tools, workflows, actions, task chains, responsibilities

cross_references.objects: Preliminary object identification for Responsibilities/Objects (detailed in PRM-VT-004)

prompts.name: Objects Library Extraction Prompt
prompts.purpose: Systematic extraction of deliverables, outputs, and tangible items with cross-referencing
prompts.description: Deep-dive on objects in taxonomy (definition, structure, categories), object identification process, object type extraction from context, cross-referencing methodology (Object ↔ Tools, Actions, Workflows, Professions), creating object entries with real examples from Video_001.
key_sections: Cross-referencing methodology (Object ↔ Tools, Actions, Workflows, Professions)
Creating object entries in Design_Deliverables.json, Documents.json, Media_Objects.json
Real examples from Video_001 (thumbnails, videos, scripts, voiceovers)
prompts.use_when: Deep-dive on extracting deliverables and outputs mentioned in video
prompts.input: Video transcription (Video_XXX.md) and Phase 3 analysis results
prompts.output: Complete object inventory with types, tools, professions, workflows, cross-references

cross_references.tools: Links objects to tools used to create them
cross_references.professions: Links objects to professions that work with them
cross_references.processes: Links objects to workflows/processes that produce them
cross_references.actions: Links objects to actions performed on them from Responsibilities/Actions
cross_references.responsibilities: Derives action+object pairings for Responsibilities library

prompts.name: Taxonomy Analysis and Updates Prompt
prompts.purpose: Complete end-to-end workflow for video transcription to full taxonomy integration
prompts.description: THE MASTER PROMPT. Covers Phase 1: Initial Video Analysis, Phase 2: Gap Analysis, Phase 3: Creation and Updates, Phase 4: Cross-Referencing, Phase 5: Reporting. Includes templates for all JSON file types (tools, objects, workflows, professions), real examples with complete JSON structures, and comprehensive quality assurance checklist.
key_sections: Phase 1: Initial Video Analysis (tools, objects, actions, processes, professions, skills)
Phase 2: Gap Analysis (checking existing taxonomy, calculating coverage metrics)
Phase 3: Creation and Updates (creating tool files, object entries, action updates, process entries)
Phase 4: Cross-Referencing (bidirectional links across all entities)
JSON templates for all 11 LIBRARIES entity types
Real examples with complete JSON structures
prompts.use_when: Performing complete taxonomy integration after initial video analysis (Phases 1-4)
prompts.output: New/updated JSON files across all LIBRARIES, bidirectional cross-references, comprehensive Video_XXX_Library_Mapping_Report.md

cross_references.tools: Creates individual tool JSON files in Tools/AI_Tools/

prompts.name: Tools Collection and Matching Prompt
prompts.purpose: Tool discovery and validation methodology for maintaining Tools library
prompts.description: Collect, validate, and match all tools mentioned across the taxonomy framework. Identify new tools, validate recently discovered tools, and enrich existing tool entries with usage context from multiple sources (TASK_MANAGERS, videos, documentation).
prompts.use_when: Processing tool discoveries from tasks, videos, documentation; maintaining Tools library
prompts.input: Tool mentions from TASK_MANAGERS analysis, video transcriptions, or other sources
prompts.output: Validated and enriched tool JSON files in Tools/AI_Tools/

cross_references.tools: Primary focus - creates and updates Tools library
cross_references.professions: Links tools to professions that use them
cross_references.skills: Links tools to skills required to use them
cross_references.processes: Links tools to workflows they support
cross_references.products: Links tools to products delivered using them

prompts.name: Products Integration Prompt
prompts.purpose: Process raw product lists with AI-first tool substitution principles
prompts.description: Guide for processing raw product lists, optimizing with AI-first tool substitutions, and integrating with taxonomy libraries. Includes AI-first compliance validation, cross-referencing with tools/skills/professions, and product optimization methodology.
prompts.use_when: Adding new products, optimizing existing products, ensuring AI-first compliance
prompts.input: Raw product lists (ID, name, description, hours, price)
prompts.output: Structured JSON with AI-first focus, cross-references to tools/skills/professions/services

cross_references.products: Primary focus - creates and updates Products library
cross_references.tools: Links products to AI tools used in delivery
cross_references.professions: Links products to who delivers them

prompts.name: VS Code Agent HQ Announcement Research Prompt
prompts.purpose: Direct external AI researchers to capture same-day VS Code Agent HQ launch details in a taxonomy-ready format
prompts.description: Provides Remote Helpers context, scope, required metadata, research workflow, output template, adoption playbook expectations, and quality checklist for investigating the new Agent HQ experience inside VS Code.
prompts.use_when: A VS Code / Agent HQ feature is announced and we need immediate research for LIBRARIES updates
prompts.input: Announcement description or link plus research date
prompts.output: Markdown research brief covering summary, snapshot table, capability breakdown, workflows, adoption steps, risks, and citations

cross_references.researches: Feeds structured findings into LIBRARIES/Researches entries
cross_references.tools: Identifies VS Code / Agent HQ tooling updates
cross_references.skills: Highlights new skills/responsibilities tied to Agent HQ

prompts.name: CV Parser v1
prompts.purpose: Extract 21 fields from candidate resumes in TSV format for CRM entry
prompts.description: AI prompt for parsing candidate resumes and extracting standardized fields in tab-separated values format. Includes strict formatting rules, department/profession matching against allowed lists, and portfolio extraction. Saves 15-20 minutes per candidate.
prompts.use_when: Processing new candidate resumes for CRM entry

cross_references.objects: Extracts data for Resume, TSV_Data, Candidate_Card objects in Responsibilities/Objects
cross_references.professions: Matches against 42 allowed professions across 6 departments

prompts.name: Communication Templates Prompt
prompts.purpose: Guide professional candidate communication with standardized templates
prompts.description: Comprehensive communication guide for HR managers including initial contact templates, company introduction, 5 mandatory pre-screening questions, 6 rejection scenarios, 4 special situations, and ideal candidate profile criteria. Ensures professional tone and clear next steps in all communications.
prompts.use_when: Communicating with candidates at any stage of recruitment

cross_references.objects: Creates Email, Initial_Contact_Message, Rejection_Letter, Company_Introduction objects in Responsibilities/Objects
cross_references.actions: Send, Respond, Pre-Screen, Reject, Invite actions from Responsibilities/Actions

prompts.name: CRM Data Entry Prompt
prompts.purpose: Guide 3-step process for parsing resumes and entering data into CRM system
prompts.description: Complete workflow for AI-powered resume parsing, Google Sheets buffer usage, and browser extension auto-fill. Includes CV Parser prompt integration, Admin Status meanings, CRM Status definitions, video/test upload procedures, and Google Drive naming conventions. Saves 15-20 minutes per candidate.
prompts.use_when: Adding new candidates to CRM system or uploading video/test materials
prompts.output: Complete CRM entry with all required fields

cross_references.objects: Creates Resume, TSV_Data, Candidate_Card, Video_Interview, CRM_Entry objects in Responsibilities/Objects
cross_references.actions: Parse, Extract, Upload, Add, Record, Update, Check actions from Responsibilities/Actions
cross_references.tools: ChatGPT, Gemini, Google_Sheets, Browser_Extension, CRM, Google_Drive tools

prompts.name: Interview Conductor Prompt
prompts.purpose: Guide interview process, evaluation, contracts, and onboarding workflows
prompts.description: Comprehensive guide for conducting group interviews with 5-phase structure, Team Lead scripts (opening, closing, questions), 4 evaluation criteria, post-interview communications, Regular contract 9-step process, and complete onboarding workflow. Includes CRM updates, Google Drive procedures, and Discord integration.
key_sections: Team Lead scripts (opening, about company, self-presentation, closing)
Onboarding process (before first day and Monday workflow)
prompts.use_when: Conducting interviews, processing contracts, or onboarding new employees
prompts.output: Structured interview guidance or post-interview communications

cross_references.objects: Creates Interview_Invitation, Regular_Contract, Employee_Card, Onboarding_SMS, Approval_Message, Rejection_Letter objects in Responsibilities/Objects
cross_references.actions: Conduct, Evaluate, Send, Sign, Onboard, Add, Update actions from Responsibilities/Actions
cross_references.tools: Google_Meet, Zoho_Sign, Google_Sheets, Google_Drive, Discord, CRM tools

prompts.name: Document Finished Project
prompts.purpose: Guide AI assistants to create comprehensive completion reports for finished projects
prompts.description: Complete template and instructions for creating standardized completion reports following Remote Helpers taxonomy documentation standards. Includes 12-section report template, input requirements checklist, quality verification, business value analysis, lessons learned framework, and examples from Phase 4, 5, 7, and 9 completions. Ensures quantified metrics, cross-references, and forward-looking enablement documentation.
key_sections: The prompt template for AI assistants
prompts.use_when: Creating completion reports for finished project phases or milestones
prompts.input: Phase/milestone information, deliverables list, time investment, goals vs results, business impact data
prompts.output: Comprehensive completion report following taxonomy standards (Phase_X_Completion_Report.md)

cross_references.task_managers: Creates Phase/Milestone completion reports in TASK_MANAGERS/Reports/
cross_references.objects: Documents deliverable files and artifacts created in Responsibilities/Objects

phases.name: Taxonomy Updates
phases.output: Updated JSON files across all LIBRARIES

7_phase_video_workflow.completeness: Full taxonomy integration from raw video to comprehensive mapping report

hr_recruitment_workflow.description: Complete candidate recruitment workflow from search to onboarding

stages.name: Resume Processing & CRM Entry
stages.estimated_time: 20-30 minutes per candidate (15-20 min saved via automation)

hr_recruitment_workflow.automation_benefits: Saves 15-20 minutes per candidate via AI parsing and browser extension auto-fill
